content:
This Week in EOS

25th of June 2018

Editorial

This week in EOS, about a week since the mainnet received enough votes, the EOS platform is up and running as it should but not without its set of controversies. In particular, we have the ECAF, an EOS arbitration body, ordering block producers to freeze EOS accounts. It goes without saying that this raises eyebrows about the level of decentralization of the EOS platform. More about it in the News section, so get to reading and have a nice week!

News

  • EOS' Blockchain Arbitrator Orders Freeze of 27 Accounts
  • The EOS saga continues â€“ Seven EOS accounts frozen
